name: places/ChIJK58luOdYwokRWnMzzWDFPWI
adrFormatAddress: 1101 1st Ave. #2, New York, NY 10065-8737, USA

originalText.text: I lost one of the screws of my eyeglasses and the lens popped out. I searched for a repair shop near me and this came up. When I got there the owner was really nice and accomodating even though I was just a walk-in. He was able to repair my glasses in 2 mins, and when I asked how much he said “dont worry about it!” and just gave me his card. I really appreciated his help because I was really having trouble doing computer work without my glasses. For my next lens adjustment or when buying a new pair of glasses (the store has lots of good choices for both eyeglasses and sunglasses, and there is also a licensed optician), I will definitely return here! Really good and efficient customer service!

originalText.text: TOP shop for frames and lenses. Manny is always there to personally assist you with patience and a smile. I have been in several times for adjustments and custom lenses. Amazing selection of glasses especially the vintage and rimless frames. Thanks for everything!

text.text: TOP shop for frames and lenses. Manny is always there to personally assist you with patience and a smile. I have been in several times for adjustments and custom lenses. Amazing selection of glasses especially the vintage and rimless frames. Thanks for everything!

originalText.text:
I have been going to Manny's for my sunglasses for years now. My whole life I have hated how I look with glasses on, even sunglasses, until I went to see Manny for the first time. He set me up with a pair of Persol aviators that I loved, wore for almost a decade, and received tons of compliments on. I finally left them on an airplane. Devastated, I shuffled over to Manny's optical again and purchased  3 pairs of shades that all look amazing.

This place only carries the highest quality frames. Even some high end companies put out poorly crafted products, but you will not see those frames at Manny's Optical no matter what brand they are, but that's not even my favorite thing. Manny seems to have an eye(pun intended) for matching frames to faces. Somehow, every single pair he suggests I immediately love, and I don't think I'm alone. Go check the place out, it might seem like a standard local eyeglasses shop, but you're in for a treat with Manny.

originalText.text: Probably the best place to get quality Glasses in the City. The discount chains will not have the quality frames and glass that  Manny’s has. You get what you pay for. I now have better than 20/20 Vision and look incredible with these titanium frames. If you want top quality glasses, Manny’s is worth it

originalText.text: Competitive pricing and excellent service. Manny cheerful worked with me to adjust my glasses until they fit perfectly. Each time he did it with patience and a smile. When he suggested it, it seemed to work. When I wanted it a certain way, it didn't. When I went with my wife to get a minor repair for glasses that she had bought elsewhere, he did it with a smile--and no charge. What a treat in NYC.
